description:
Despite his best efforts, Handa continues to get involved in the most bizarre situations. This time, his misadventures end up affecting his memory.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Handa et le conseil étudiant / Handa et la perte de mémoire
Handa-kun and the Student Council / Handa-kun and Memory Loss
Handa-kun to Seitokai / Handa-kun to Kiokusoushitsu
半田くんと生徒会 / 半田くんと記憶喪失
